author: Okogba
title: LOVE ZONE: Searching for a partner?
text:
Home » Relationships » LOVE ZONE: Searching for a partner? LOVE ZONE: Searching for a partner? On 8:01 pm In Relationships by Okogba Comments 
Networking/ Sponsorship •Titilayo, needs kind hearted Nigerians to sponsor her father’s treatment of prostrate cancer, acct 0033545061, Diamond Bank, Titilayo Joseph.09033117631 •Omoregba, 28, resides in Benin, needs someone to sponsor his music career. 09098714819 •Abiodun, needs a matured Yoruba business lady for serious partnership.08031901055 •Friday, 37, needs kind hearted responsible Nigerians for sponsorship to start and fulfil his Agric business crop production.08089674473 •Lanre, 26, a photographer and a graphic designer, needs a kind hearted person to support him financially to start up his photography job. 08093012531 •Roni, a Gospel musician, needs a Record deal and a good sponsor who can help manage and give him money for his music career. 07061950848 
Friends •Ada, 25, a student, from Delta state, needs genius friends.08130282013 
Searching Male •Fortune, 29, from Delta State, needs female friends who resides in Delta or Edo State, aged 20 and above. 09055141445,08054829010,BBM 56569235 
Lovers Searching Female 
•Oluchi, 24, chocolate in complexion, plumpy and resides in Anambra state, needs a God fearing man, for a relationship. 08063779276 •Ava 27, chocolate in complexion, tall and gorgeous, resides in Lagos, needs a cool and caring man, aged 35-55. 09097385261 •Chinyere, 25, a nurse by profession, needs a man, aged 40- 50 for marriage. 07033157733,08133212277 •Jennifer, average height, beautiful, sexy blue eyes, sophisticated, good diction with tundra behind and succulent boobs needs a caring elderly man aged 49 and above for love and relationship. 08188693999 •Christabel, 31, needs a man, aged 35-40, for a serious relationship, that will lead to marriage. 08114411034 •Toyin, a teacher from Ogun state, needs a Christian and God fearing man, aged 38-52, for a serious relationship, that can lead to marriage. 07038528419,07038528765 
Searching Male •Brit, 30, from Delta State but resides in Lagos needs a decent lady, who is educated and a Christian,for a relationship, aged 23-27. 08157258414 •Emeka, 22, from Anambra state, needs a lady, aged 35-50, for a relationship. 09070671319 •Oghenekaro, 30, a graduate from Delta State, needs a good lady, aged 21-26, for a serious relationship, that will lead to marriage. 07036856781 •Bj, a businessman and resides in Benin, needs a pretty, fair in complexion, curvy, sexy and active lady, for a relationshipthat will lead to marriage. 07069001922 •Moses, 23, needs a lady, aged 25-40 for a relationship. 08035987785 •Victor, tall and handsome, needs a lady, in Delta State, forarelationship.09079427184 •Tony,29,agraduate,employed and resides in Abuja, needs anindependent lady, for a serious relationship that can lead to marriage. 08065393538 •Peter,33, needs a matured lady, aged 35-50, for a serious relationship.08113584892 •Joshua ,33 employed and resides in Benin City, needs a lady, aged 22-30, for aserious relationship.08137470895 •Aghogho, 45, from Warri Delta state, needs a matured lady, aged 50-55, for sexual relationship.08031373893 Blossom,45,dark in complexion, 5.8ft tall employed and resides inEnugu, needs a Christian,lady,aged 25-35,fair in complexion 4.5ft tall Plumpy, employed or self employed and resides in Enugu or ready to relocate to Enugu, for a relationship. 08099267407,08033829866 
•Gbenga, 37, slim, tall, dark in completion, employed and resides in Lagos, needs a caring, romantic and employed lady, aged 38-40, for a relationship.08085838120, bbm 2BB75CC9, 08054747429 •Don, a car dealer and professional herba lpractitioner from Ondo state, needs a lady, aged 25-30, who is a graduate, for a relationship. 08067508525 •Okpe, 37, dark in complexion, needs a matured lady, aged 40-48, for a romantic, relationship.08175818211 
•Sailas, chocolate in complexion and good looking, needs a good looking lady, aged 17-23 who is serious for a relationship.09078518967 •William, 45, employed, needs a God fearing lady, who is beautiful, employed or doing good business, aged 25-35, for marriage.07084895006, 08152046351,09091559297 
Sugar Cares Searching Male 
•Sunny, 31, resides in PH, needs a good sugar mummy, aged 50-60, for a relationship. 07032847903 •Ade, 47, from Ogun state, but resides in Lagos, needs a caring, romantic and sweet sugar mummy that can take care of him financially. 08034889002 •Parker, gentle, dark in complexion and educated, needs a neat sugar mummy, who can take care of him, in Rivers state, Calabar or Uyo for a relationship.08066886825 •Victor, 33, a graduate, needs a sugar mummy.08165622268 •Martins,30,chocolate in complexion, from Enugu state, needs a nice and good sugar mummy. 08024399988,08145660022 •Wisdom, 25, from Delta state, needs a sugar mummy, aged 35-55.08135173162 •Adah, 27, needs a sugar mummy.07033681067,09093202663 •ID, 29, needs a hot sugar mummy, in Uyo, PH. 07064511321 •Justice, 31, from Delta State, needs a sugar mummy. 09057351917 •Michael, 27, a model, from Imo state but resides in Lagos, needs a sugar mummy that can take good care of him financially. 08073060904,08132031927 
•Matthew, 26, handsome, tall, dark in complexion, and resides in Ughelli, Delta state, needs a caring, rich, lovely, romantic and God fearing sugar mummy, who will help him financially, aged 28 and above, from Delta, Benin or Lagos, for a serious relationship. 07084413391, 08138421876
